document.title: Subjects available in Mechanical Engineering.
document.classes: 4 hours per week (lectures and tutorials) for one semester.
document.assessment: tutorial assignments and one 2hr exam at end of course.
document.syllabus: Fluid statics. The Bernoulli equation. Energy equation. Momentum equation. Differential Continuity equation. Differential Energy equation. Differential Momentum equation. Dimensional Analysis. Similitude. Laminar flow. Turbulent flow. Lift and Drag. Boundary layer theory.
